title: When using navigation apps, GPS positioning is slow or fails to determine location
answer:
GPS signal is weak indoors. This can cause positioning to be slow or to fail completely. Please use the GPS in open spaces where signal is stronger.

Some navigation apps require an Internet connection for positioning. If positioning fails, please enable Wi-Fi or mobile data. A mobile Internet connection will help with positioning.

If GPS positioning still fails after attempting the above, please contact the app's developer or try positioning again with a different navigation app.

If the problem persists, please contact Huawei customer service or take your phone and purchase invoice to a service center for inspection.
keywords: GPS, navigation, location, failed, slow to find location
